name: Microwave BBQ Chicken Pizza with Coleslaw and Grapes
description: Family pizza night in under 15 minutes using a microwaveable BBQ chicken pizza with chilled coleslaw and fresh grapes on the side.
prep_steps: Open the coleslaw and have a serving spoon ready.
Rinse the grapes and pat dry.
cook_steps: Remove the bbq chicken pizza from packaging and place it on a microwave-safe plate.
Microwave the pizza per pack directions until hot in the center (typically 3–5 minutes).
Let the pizza rest 1 minute, then slice into 8 pieces.
Serve 2 slices per person with a scoop of coleslaw and a handful of grapes on each plate.
